name: coupon-1
effect: One of three coupons needed to receive a Pokétch.
short_effect: The first of three tickets used to obtain a Pokétch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A coupon to be exchanged for a Pokémon Watch— Pokétch for short. Three coupons are needed.
